com.github.cuter44.wxmp.util

类 CertificateLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.cuter44.wxmp.util.CertificateLoader

  • public class CertificateLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Transient tool-object to load certificate and generate ssl-context Code adapted from nyafx/crypto. Thread-unsafe. This toolkit provided an ease way to load certificate meterial from classpath

      • asSSLContext

        public javax.net.ssl.SSLContext asSSLContext()

      • loadTrusts

        public CertificateLoader loadTrusts(java.lang.String... resourcePaths)
        Load trusts from .crt file. Existing trusts will be dropped.

      • loadIdentification

        public CertificateLoader loadIdentification(java.lang.String resourcePath,
                                   java.lang.String passphrase)
        Load identification from .p12 file. Existing identification will be dropped.
        参数:
        passphrase - Passphrase to decrypt the cert, mch_id if certificate is acquired from pay.weixin.qq.com .

        public CertificateLoader config(java.util.Properties conf)
